product_name: Samsung Galaxy M36 5G (Orange Haze, 6 GB RAM, 128 GB Storage) Circle to Search Google Gemini Corning Gorilla Glass Victus Plus 7.7mm Slim AI Enhanced 50 MP OIS Triple Camera Unmatched Nightography
review: Battery isn't up to the mark. Sleek, stylish, decent camera, value for money of course.

product_name: Samsung Galaxy M36 5G (Orange Haze, 6 GB RAM, 128 GB Storage) Circle to Search Google Gemini Corning Gorilla Glass Victus Plus 7.7mm Slim AI Enhanced 50 MP OIS Triple Camera Unmatched Nightography
review: Product comes with only c to c cable.

product_name: Samsung Galaxy M36 5G (Orange Haze, 6 GB RAM, 128 GB Storage) Circle to Search Google Gemini Corning Gorilla Glass Victus Plus 7.7mm Slim AI Enhanced 50 MP OIS Triple Camera Unmatched Nightography
review: Its actually a good phone.

product_name: Samsung Galaxy M36 5G (Orange Haze, 6 GB RAM, 128 GB Storage) Circle to Search Google Gemini Corning Gorilla Glass Victus Plus 7.7mm Slim AI Enhanced 50 MP OIS Triple Camera Unmatched Nightography
review: Bought it as soon as launched. Good phone on budget. Could have been better but given the price, company decided itne paise main itnaich milega. Good camera is the only good thing I can think about. Case is plastic make, light weight, phone hangs a lot even with 8GB RAM and 128GB storage. Can't play music loud, the phone vibrates. Could have provided a back cover with the phone which would be helpful, the one I ordered doesn't have the precision cuts for the buttons.

product_name: Samsung Galaxy M36 5G (Orange Haze, 6 GB RAM, 128 GB Storage) Circle to Search Google Gemini Corning Gorilla Glass Victus Plus 7.7mm Slim AI Enhanced 50 MP OIS Triple Camera Unmatched Nightography
review: Good display. Easy setup. Fast. Excellent camera. AI features. Back panel looks flimsy.

product_name: Samsung Galaxy M36 5G (Orange Haze, 6 GB RAM, 128 GB Storage) Circle to Search Google Gemini Corning Gorilla Glass Victus Plus 7.7mm Slim AI Enhanced 50 MP OIS Triple Camera Unmatched Nightography
review: I took this phone on 14th July and I noticed that after 2 to 3 days the battery is draining too fast like it is working only for 1 day and this phone heats a lot. Overall this phone is good quality and has nice features. Samsung should improve the battery quality of this phone so that it will last for 2 days maximum.

product_name: Samsung Galaxy M36 5G (Orange Haze, 6 GB RAM, 128 GB Storage) Circle to Search Google Gemini Corning Gorilla Glass Victus Plus 7.7mm Slim AI Enhanced 50 MP OIS Triple Camera Unmatched Nightography
review: The phone specs are good but it's overpriced. The back panel is vibrating to the sound coming from the speaker. The performance is good. Overall a decent phone if you are looking for budget but it's not worth eighteen thousand, recommend if sixteen thousand or less in sale.

product_name: Samsung Galaxy M36 5G (Orange Haze, 6 GB RAM, 128 GB Storage) Circle to Search Google Gemini Corning Gorilla Glass Victus Plus 7.7mm Slim AI Enhanced 50 MP OIS Triple Camera Unmatched Nightography
review: Camera not good. Processor is not enough for multitasking. Battery is less compared to previous version M35. Good thing is only software update. Other companies provide a plastic back cover but Samsung provides no charger and no back cover.

product_name: Samsung Galaxy M36 5G (Orange Haze, 6 GB RAM, 128 GB Storage) Circle to Search Google Gemini Corning Gorilla Glass Victus Plus 7.7mm Slim AI Enhanced 50 MP OIS Triple Camera Unmatched Nightography
review: Downgrade from M35. I have both M35 and M36. Based on the usage this phone has smaller battery, five thousand versus six thousand in M35, one speaker versus stereo in M35, teardrop display versus punch hole in M35. Only upgrade is this one is slimmer and looks better than M35.

product_name: Samsung Galaxy M36 5G (Orange Haze, 6 GB RAM, 128 GB Storage) Circle to Search Google Gemini Corning Gorilla Glass Victus Plus 7.7mm Slim AI Enhanced 50 MP OIS Triple Camera Unmatched Nightography
review: Good phone overall for seventeen and a half thousand. Display three and a half out of five, not as vivid as my old Nokia with pure display and that one was an LCD. Speed and processor four out of five. Battery four out of five. Software three and a half out of five, too many unnecessary Samsung apps, bloatware, however the One UI depth is impressive and you get Samsung updates for many years. Design three and a half or maybe four out of five, plastic back, ordinary design. Camera four out of five. Price four out of five. Will I buy again? Yes. At this price range there may be better configurations, but Samsung has strong support and a mature ecosystem. I hope they reduce bloatware, they don't need it to sell their devices. A clean install with minimum Samsung apps will be so good.

product_name: Samsung Galaxy M36 5G (Orange Haze, 6 GB RAM, 128 GB Storage) Circle to Search Google Gemini Corning Gorilla Glass Victus Plus 7.7mm Slim AI Enhanced 50 MP OIS Triple Camera Unmatched Nightography
review: Decent phone, large display, jazzy colours. Biometric sensor is on power button, something different in this category. Below are some ratings on different areas: Call clarity - 5, Touchscreen - 5, Camera - 4, Speaker - 4, Battery life - 4.5. Total value for money phone. Worth it!

product_name: Samsung Galaxy M36 5G (Orange Haze, 6 GB RAM, 128 GB Storage) Circle to Search Google Gemini Corning Gorilla Glass Victus Plus 7.7mm Slim AI Enhanced 50 MP OIS Triple Camera Unmatched Nightography
review: Decent phone for regular usage. Not for gaming. It does have heating problem. Camera is perfect for daily usage. Battery life is almost 14 hours. I personally like display. Colors pop up.

product_name: Samsung Galaxy M36 5G (Orange Haze, 6 GB RAM, 128 GB Storage) Circle to Search Google Gemini Corning Gorilla Glass Victus Plus 7.7mm Slim AI Enhanced 50 MP OIS Triple Camera Unmatched Nightography
review: Honest raw review. The mobile is not worthy of the price though I bought 8GB RAM. The mobile processing and response is slow and the camera is not good for this price. Camera of mobile feels like less than 10k also the clarity of the screen is not that great. The signals and switching between wifi and mobile data is not proper. If you are expecting it to be very good I suggest not to go for it. You can buy it if you want to try all the latest AI features. Else if you are expecting a good camera and fast processing then go for a higher end mobile of 25k or more. The screen size is good and feels big which is good but the performance can be better. I used Samsung M33 which was very good but did not expect M36 like this.

product_name: Samsung Galaxy M36 5G (Orange Haze, 6 GB RAM, 128 GB Storage) Circle to Search Google Gemini Corning Gorilla Glass Victus Plus 7.7mm Slim AI Enhanced 50 MP OIS Triple Camera Unmatched Nightography
review: Nice phone for normal users. Camera is decent for this cost. AI is used for playing and saving photos in gallery. Please provide a charger.

product_name: Samsung Galaxy M36 5G (Orange Haze, 6 GB RAM, 128 GB Storage) Circle to Search Google Gemini Corning Gorilla Glass Victus Plus 7.7mm Slim AI Enhanced 50 MP OIS Triple Camera Unmatched Nightography
review: Smooth experience. Good build quality. Great camera. But battery for average user is OK for one day. If it is 6000mAh it will make it the best choice.

product_name: Samsung Galaxy M36 5G (Orange Haze, 6 GB RAM, 128 GB Storage) Circle to Search Google Gemini Corning Gorilla Glass Victus Plus 7.7mm Slim AI Enhanced 50 MP OIS Triple Camera Unmatched Nightography
review: Good mobile so far. But camera not up to the mark and photos are not that clear.

product_name: Samsung Galaxy M36 5G (Orange Haze, 6 GB RAM, 128 GB Storage) Circle to Search Google Gemini Corning Gorilla Glass Victus Plus 7.7mm Slim AI Enhanced 50 MP OIS Triple Camera Unmatched Nightography
review: Nice phone but camera is not as good as the company claims. Battery backup is average.

product_name: Samsung Galaxy M36 5G (Orange Haze, 6 GB RAM, 128 GB Storage) Circle to Search Google Gemini Corning Gorilla Glass Victus Plus 7.7mm Slim AI Enhanced 50 MP OIS Triple Camera Unmatched Nightography
review: Battery is not sustaining for a full day compared to F series.

product_name: Samsung Galaxy M36 5G (Orange Haze, 6 GB RAM, 128 GB Storage) Circle to Search Google Gemini Corning Gorilla Glass Victus Plus 7.7mm Slim AI Enhanced 50 MP OIS Triple Camera Unmatched Nightography
review: The phone does not have slots for two SIMs and an SD card. You may insert only one SIM and one card or two SIMs.

product_name: Samsung Galaxy M36 5G (Orange Haze, 6 GB RAM, 128 GB Storage) Circle to Search Google Gemini Corning Gorilla Glass Victus Plus 7.7mm Slim AI Enhanced 50 MP OIS Triple Camera Unmatched Nightography
review: Ok

product_name: Samsung Galaxy M36 5G (Orange Haze, 6 GB RAM, 128 GB Storage) Circle to Search Google Gemini Corning Gorilla Glass Victus Plus 7.7mm Slim AI Enhanced 50 MP OIS Triple Camera Unmatched Nightography
review: Excellent Display: The Samsung Galaxy M36 5G features a stunning 6.7-inch Super AMOLED display with a 120Hz refresh rate, providing an immersive viewing experience. Long-Lasting Battery: The phone's massive 5000mAh battery ensures extended usage, making it perfect for heavy users. Impressive Cameras: The phone's AI-powered camera capabilities deliver high-quality images and videos. Future-Proof: With Samsung's reliable One UI and promise of 6 years of software updates, this phone is a smart investment for anyone looking for a device that will stay relevant for years to come. Affordable: The Samsung Galaxy M36 5G offers premium features at an affordable price, making it an attractive option for budget-conscious buyers. Negative Points: Performance Issues: The phone's performance can be laggy at times, which may be frustrating for some users. Slow Charging: The charging speed could be faster, especially considering the phone's large battery capacity. Plastic Back: The phone's plastic back may not appeal to users seeking a premium feel and look. No Stereo Speakers: The lack of stereo speakers might be a disappointment for some users who value high-quality audio. Design: The phone's front design, featuring an Infinity-U notch, looks dated compared to its predecessor, which may not appeal to some users.

product_name: Samsung Galaxy M36 5G (Orange Haze, 6 GB RAM, 128 GB Storage) Circle to Search Google Gemini Corning Gorilla Glass Victus Plus 7.7mm Slim AI Enhanced 50 MP OIS Triple Camera Unmatched Nightography
review: I purchased the Samsung M36 5G on 16 July 2025 from Amazon, and within just a few days, the display stopped working completely. I immediately reached out to Amazon for a replacement, but to my surprise, they refused to provide any support or replacement, even though the issue occurred well within the return period. I then visited the Samsung Service Centre, hoping for a resolution, but the experience was even worse. The staff was unhelpful, and no proper service or repair was provided. I have wasted hours with no result. I feel completely let down by both Samsung and Amazon. This was a high-value product, and I expected at least basic after-sales service. Unfortunately, this has turned into a frustrating and disappointing experience. I strongly advise others to think twice before buying this phone or trusting the service support from either Samsung or Amazon.

product_name: Samsung Galaxy M36 5G (Orange Haze, 6 GB RAM, 128 GB Storage) Circle to Search Google Gemini Corning Gorilla Glass Victus Plus 7.7mm Slim AI Enhanced 50 MP OIS Triple Camera Unmatched Nightography
review: Don't think too much. Except the missing part of punch hole, the phone is actually good. I got it at 16000 from Amazon. Considering the price point, it is awesome. I'll update after a few days of use. But I must say, the build quality is brilliant. It looks very premium and battery lasts pretty good. Out of the box it had 64 percent and after 5 to 6 hours of continual use, it is still standing strong at 14 percent. I think that's pretty handy. It will surely last a day. The camera quality is quite good also. As of now, I haven't seen any bad issue with it. Maybe not a huge upgrade from M35 physically but considering the software development, that's also a good point. It is very smooth and didn't experience any heating issue, except after that first boot, which is quite natural for any phone. Go for it. Don't worry.

product_name: Samsung Galaxy M36 5G (Orange Haze, 6 GB RAM, 128 GB Storage) Circle to Search Google Gemini Corning Gorilla Glass Victus Plus 7.7mm Slim AI Enhanced 50 MP OIS Triple Camera Unmatched Nightography
review: Good mobile. Sound is clear. UI is clear and simple. Camera is good. No lagging.

product_name: Samsung Galaxy M36 5G (Orange Haze, 6 GB RAM, 128 GB Storage) Circle to Search Google Gemini Corning Gorilla Glass Victus Plus 7.7mm Slim AI Enhanced 50 MP OIS Triple Camera Unmatched Nightography
review: Mobile looks good and slim, however observed heat while using. Battery backup is good. Camera quality is average.

product_name: Samsung Galaxy M36 5G (Orange Haze, 6 GB RAM, 128 GB Storage) Circle to Search Google Gemini Corning Gorilla Glass Victus Plus 7.7mm Slim AI Enhanced 50 MP OIS Triple Camera Unmatched Nightography
review: The Samsung Galaxy M36 5G is an excellent mid-range smartphone that checks all the right boxes. Its impressive display, robust performance, and advanced camera capabilities make it a compelling choice for those seeking a reliable and feature-packed device.

product_name: Samsung Galaxy M36 5G (Orange Haze, 6 GB RAM, 128 GB Storage) Circle to Search Google Gemini Corning Gorilla Glass Victus Plus 7.7mm Slim AI Enhanced 50 MP OIS Triple Camera Unmatched Nightography
review: The mobile is good but the antenna is poor and there is a reason to say that. I was using Honor Y9 Prime 2019 and when I compare the Samsung Galaxy M36 5G to the Honor, the antenna power of Honor is much better as it used to pull 3G inside the house at least 1 bar and 2G. I thought buying this phone would improve the signal but to my surprise the new Samsung phone can't pull the 2G signal, let alone 3G, 4G, and don't dream about 5G. So if anyone is thinking to buy this phone for better signal power if facing network problem, don't buy as the technology has not improved from 2019 to 2025, it has become worse. So this mobile has become my computer as I can't call from the mobile. The company should improve their signal power. Hope they take a note of this.

product_name: Samsung Galaxy M36 5G (Orange Haze, 6 GB RAM, 128 GB Storage) Circle to Search Google Gemini Corning Gorilla Glass Victus Plus 7.7mm Slim AI Enhanced 50 MP OIS Triple Camera Unmatched Nightography
review: Ordered this for my mom. The usage is typically 1 to 2 hours of network or WhatsApp calls with family, involving voice and video calls per day. Maybe 1 to 2 hours of video content viewing over WiFi and data. Overall 5 hours of screen on time per day. The phone does get a bit hot after 1 hour of video calls which I guess is ok at this price point. I observed some app crashes like while making some UPI payments, when it tries to open camera module to scan QR codes, strange. However, it's less than a week of observations, probably some software updates could fix some issues. Hoping for the hardware to last 6 plus years like the software updates. Camera is decent. Sound over speaker is loud and gets the job done. Do not expect gaming. Battery life so far seems decent with the usage level, lasts a day with 5 to 6 hours screen on time with 30 to 40 percent left by end of the day. For the price you could get other options, but my need is for longer software updates and that's the only selling point. Otherwise a 3 to 4 star phone in terms of value for money.

product_name: Samsung Galaxy M36 5G (Orange Haze, 6 GB RAM, 128 GB Storage) Circle to Search Google Gemini Corning Gorilla Glass Victus Plus 7.7mm Slim AI Enhanced 50 MP OIS Triple Camera Unmatched Nightography
review: Product is good in quality but there are a few disadvantages. If you use an SD card then only one SIM can be used since they provide only 2 slots and there is no separate slot for SD card. There is no charger included as well and no slot for headphone jack so you can only use wireless earphones and cannot use wired earphones.

product_name: Samsung Galaxy M36 5G (Orange Haze, 6 GB RAM, 128 GB Storage) Circle to Search Google Gemini Corning Gorilla Glass Victus Plus 7.7mm Slim AI Enhanced 50 MP OIS Triple Camera Unmatched Nightography
review: While installing 6 to 8 apps my mobile is getting hot. I do not know if that is normal or not, need to use the mobile for a month. Looks wise, it is elegant and has nice features. But I feel camera quality is average. I will share more after a few days. Thanks.
